title: How to Make Neiman Marcus Cake

steps.headline: Mix the box of Duncan Hines butter cake mix, 2 eggs, and 1 stick of butter.
Pour the mixed batter into a greased and floured 13 x 9 inch pan
Wet fingers and press gently into the bottom of the pan to make sure there is no air on the bottom of the pan.
steps.description: Smooth evenly. The mix will be thick.

steps.headline: Soften the cream cheese on the stove or in the microwave.
Combine the cream cheese, box of powdered sugar (save enough to sift on top of finished cake)2 eggs and 1 tsp.
Pour this mix of the cake batter in the pan and smooth.
Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes or until the middle is brown and bubbling.
Sift powdered sugar evenly on top.
steps.description: This should be a thick layer, but the actual amount used is left to personal preference.

steps.headline: Cut into squares and serve when cooled.

text: Pre-heat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Mix the box of Duncan Hines butter cake mix, 2 eggs, and 1 stick of butter.  Pour the mixed batter into a greased and floured 13 x 9 inch pan  Wet fingers and press gently into the bottom of the pan to make sure there is no air on the bottom of the pan. Smooth evenly. The mix will be thick. Soften the cream cheese on the stove or in the microwave.  Combine the cream cheese, box of powdered sugar (save enough to sift on top of finished cake)2 eggs and 1 tsp. of vanilla. Mix these ingredients until smooth.  Pour this mix of the cake batter in the pan and smooth.  Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes or until the middle is brown and bubbling.  Sift powdered sugar evenly on top. This should be a thick layer, but the actual amount used is left to personal preference. Cut into squares and serve when cooled.  Finished.
